text: Jo log yeh boht bara bohtan bandh laye hain yeh bhi tum mein say hi aik giroh hai. Tum issay apnay liye bura na samjho bulkay yeh to tumharay haq mein behtar hai. Haan inn mein say her aik shaks per itna gunah hai jitna uss ney kamaya hai aur inn mein say jiss ney iss kay boht baray hissay ko sir anjam diya hai uss kay liye azab bhi boht hi bara hai
